metadata.description: Measure optimistic and pessimistic tendencies with positive and negative scoring

questions.question_text: I usually expect the best outcome in uncertain situations
questions.help_text: Rate how much you agree with this optimistic statement

questions.question_text: When things go wrong, I tend to assume they'll keep getting worse
questions.help_text: Rate how much you agree with this pessimistic statement

questions.question_text: I believe that good things will happen to me in the future
questions.help_text: Rate how much you agree with this optimistic statement

questions.question_text: I often worry that things will turn out badly
questions.help_text: Rate how much you agree with this pessimistic statement

questions.question_text: I generally look forward to new experiences
questions.help_text: Rate how much you agree with this optimistic statement

scoring.description: Measures optimism vs pessimism using mixed positive/negative scoring. Optimistic statements (Q1, Q3, Q5) score positively when agreed with. Pessimistic statements (Q2, Q4) are reverse-scored - disagreeing gives positive points.
